readable.title: 1797554350_20998753c0
readable.content: A jogger is being sheltered with an umbrella . A runner is being handed a water bottle from a woman in a teal jacket holding an umbrella . A woman assists a marathon runner by holding an umbrella over her and giving her water . A woman is holding a pink and brown umbrella for a lady running in a race wearing number 13406 . On a rainy day , a woman holds an umbrella above a runner and gives her water .
